definitions.definition: Any mythical being which is part human, part animal.
Someone with an intense spiritual or psychological identification as a non-human animal.
examples: Identifying as a therianthrope , Alex felt a deep, instinctive connection to wolves that shaped their sense of self and community.

main_definition: ( mythology ) Any mythical being which is part human, part animal.
secondary_definitions: ( otherkin subculture ) Someone with an intense spiritual or psychological identification as a non-human animal.
